title: Backend Infrastructure Engineer
description: As a Backend Infrastructure Engineer, you will focus on the core services and systems that power our platform. Your primary goal will be to design and implement highly scalable, reliable, and performant backend architectures. You will work with distributed systems, microservices, and high-throughput messaging queues. Responsibilities include optimizing server-side logic, managing cloud infrastructure on AWS, and ensuring data integrity across various storage solutions. We are looking for someone with deep expertise in Python or Go, experience with SQL and NoSQL databases, and a solid understanding of system design patterns and concurrency.
